title: Can Piastri match a Senna F1 record? - What to watch out for at Imola
summary: The Emilia Romagna GP will kick off the European F1 season, and the second triple-header of 2025, this weekend. Here are the main topics to watch out for at Imola

qa_pairs.question: Which Grand Prix is referred to as the Emilia Romagna GP?
In which year did the Emilia Romagna GP become part of the Formula 1 calendar?
What is a triple-header in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Three consecutive races held in different locations over a three-week period.
wrong_options: Three races held on the same circuit in one weekend.
Three races with different teams competing.
Three races with the same driver lineup.
